product_name: Maui Jim Mavericks Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Maui Jim Mavericks polarized sunglasses offer classic aviator styling with a modern twist. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Pure titanium frames are lightweight, durable and comfortable; gloss finish for a sleek look. Non-slip silicone nose pads keep the sunglasses in place. Aviator frames complement smaller to medium faces. The Maui Jim Mavericks polarized sunglasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Mavericks polarized sunglasses offer classic aviator styling with a modern twist.
